name: amqplib-as-promised
description: Amqlib wrapper for support publishing new messages as promised
author: Tadeusz Wawszczak <tadeusz.wawszczak@onet.eu>

scripts.clean: npm run clean:compile && npm run clean:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run compile && tsc --pretty -p test && tslint -t stylish -p . && tslint -t stylish -p test && markdownlint "*.md"
scripts.postpublish: node -e "require(\"changelog-parser\")(\"CHANGELOG.md\").then(ch => console.log(ch.versions.filter(v => v.version === \"$npm_package_version\").map(v => \"v$npm_package_version\n\n\" + v.body).concat(\"Release v$npm_package_version\")[0]))" | xargs -0 git tag v$npm_package_version -a -m && git push --tags
scripts.test:coverage: npm run clean:coverage && cross-env NYC="nyc --no-clean --reporter=lcov" npm run test:spec && nyc report --reporter=text-summary --color
